laptoptralalero.name: Laptop
laptoptralalero.description: A high-performance laptop with 16GB RAM and 512GB SSD.

smartfridge.name: Smart Fridge
smartfridge.description: Knows when you're sad and offers ice cream. WiFi-enabled, because why not?

toasterdeluxe.name: Toaster Deluxe
toasterdeluxe.description: Toasts bread, insults your cooking. Two settings: warm and flame-thrower.

hoverbroom.name: HoverBroom
hoverbroom.description: Sweeps your floor and your enemies. Not legally classified as a drone… yet.

quantumtoothbrush.name: Quantum Toothbrush
quantumtoothbrush.description: Cleans your teeth in every parallel universe. Powered by mild existential dread.

couchpotato.name: Couch Potato
couchpotato.description: Ergonomic couch with built-in snack compartments. Lazy mode included by default.

mysterybox.name: Mystery Box
mysterybox.description: Could be a treasure. Could be socks. Schrödinger would be proud.
